Block Bot Accounts on X (Twitter)

XBlockList works with XBlockBot to help you clean up your X feed. Import bot lists directly from your XBlockBot scan reports and block them automatically.

Features:
• Smart Blocking: Block hundreds of bots with rate limiting to keep your account safe
• Real-time Progress: Watch the blocking progress and estimated time remaining
• Flexible Control: Pause, resume, or stop blocking anytime
• Smart Import: Works directly with your XBlockBot scan reports
• Manual Import: Add your own list of bot IDs

Simple to use:
1. Run a scan on XBlockBot.com
2. Open XBlockList
3. Click to start blocking


Keep your X followers authentic and bot-free with XBlockList!
